dcterms:creator: K. Cobbe
O. Klimov
C. Hesse
T. Kim
J. Schulman
dcterms:description: CoinRun is a reinforcement learning problem designed to evaluate the generalization performance of trained agents. It consists of levels where the agent must collect a coin while avoiding various obstacles.
dcterms:title: CoinRun

dcterms:creator: L.L. Di Langosco
J. Koch
L.D. Sharkey
J. Pfau
D. Krueger
dcterms:description: Goal Misgeneralization is a concept in deep reinforcement learning that occurs when an agent trained to maximize a specific reward fails to do so in a new environment due to a mismatch between the intended and behavioral objectives.
dcterms:title: Goal Misgeneralization

dcterms:creator: M. Franklin
R. Gorman
H. Ashton
S. Armstrong
dcterms:description: ACE (Algorithm for Concept Extrapolation) is an algorithm designed to extrapolate concepts from training to new environments without requiring reward information in those environments.
dcterms:title: ACE (Algorithm for Concept Extrapolation)
